verbs.description: monster cake pops jack o lantern peppers and more party recipes [ARG1: one of the best things about halloween] [V: is] [ARG2: the fun of turning normal foods into creepy versions a regular cheese ball can become a spooky cheesy goblin guacamole transforms into a barfing pumpkin and cookies get all wrapped up like a mummy usa]
